section.name: Introduction
section.p: This Maven plugin can convert xDoc files (used by Maven Site) to Markdown files (Wiki format used by GitHub).
The goal readme can create the README.md file from the src/site/xdoc/index.xml .

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: Download the project and install the plugin:
